message.translation: 砂-粉砂-粘土 图解 (Blott & Pye, 2012)

message.source: The linkage method for calculating the distance between the newly formed cluster and each observation vector.
message.translation: 连接方法是用于计算新形成的簇与每个观测向量的距离的函数。

message.source: If use the decomposed features of PCA.
It determines the numbers of PCs.
message.translation: 它决定了主成分的数量。

message.source: Standardization is necessary to balance different features.
message.oldsource: Standardization is necessary to balance different feature.
message.translation: 标为了平衡不同的特征，标准化是必要的。

message.source: The number of leaves at the bottom level of the figure.
message.translation: 图表最底层的叶节点的数量。

message.source: The linkage method is not compatible with the distance metric.
message.translation: 当前所选的连接方法与距离度量不匹配。

message.source: The dataset has not been loaded.
The clustering algorithm has not been performed.
Choose a filename to save the clustering result
message.translation: 选取一个文件来保存聚类结果
正在保存聚类分析结果...

message.source: An unknown exception was raised. Please check the logs for more details.
message.translation: 出现了一个未知的异常。请检查日志以获取详情。

message.source: Choose a filename to save the generated dataset
message.translation: 选取一个文件来保存生成的数据集
正在保存生成的数据集...

message.source: Can not load the grain size dataset from this file. Please check the logs for more details.
message.translation: 无法从该文件 中加载粒度数据集。请检查日志以获取详情。

message.source: The current layout setting is invalid.
message.translation: 当前对数据布局的设置是无效的。

message.source: Select a file which stores the grain size dataset
message.translation: 选则一个保存了粒度数据集的文件

message.source: The dataset has not been loaded.
The dataset size exceeded the limitation of remote grpc server.
message.translation: 数据集的大小超出了远程GRPC服务器的限制。

message.source: The EMMA fitting task failed, please check the logs for more details.
message.translation: EMMA的拟合任务失败了，请检查日志以获取详情。

message.source: Choose a filename to save the selected EMMA result
message.translation: 选取一个文件来保存EMMA结果

message.source: Choose the file which stores the dumped EMMA result
message.translation: 选择一个储存了EMMA结果的文件

message.source: The binary file is invalid (i.e., the object in it is not the EMMA result).
message.translation: 这个二进制文件是无效的（里面的对象不是EMMA结果）。

message.source: PyTorch can use the NVIDIA GPU to do calculations.
The function to calculate the difference between prediction and observation.
message.translation: 该函数被用来计算预测和观测数据之间的差异。

message.source: The number of epochs before formal training. The pretrain process only update the proportions of end members.
message.translation: 正式训练之前的训练轮数。预训练过程只更新端元的相对含量。

message.source: Minimum number of epochs to be performed.
Maximum number of epochs to be performed.
It controls the precision of final loss.
message.translation: 它决定了算法中损失函数最终值的精度。

message.source: The learning rate of the neural network to update its weights from gradient.
message.translation: 神经网络从梯度更新权重时的学习率。

message.source: Betas are the coefficients used for computing running averages of gradient and its square.
message.translation: Beta值是用于滑动平均梯度的系数。

message.source: Update the distributions of end members while training the model or not.
message.translation: 是否在训练模型时更新端元的分布。

message.source: Record the variation history of parameters or not.
message.translation: 是否记录参数的变化历史。

message.source: The dataset has not been loaded.
Closing this window will terminate all running tasks, are you sure to close it?
message.translation: 关闭该窗口将会终止所有运行中的任务，你确定要关闭它吗？

message.source: Choose a filename to save the PCA result
Convert Selected UDM Result To SSU Results
message.translation: 将选中的UDM结果转换为SSU结果

message.source: Converting the selected UDM result to SSU results...
message.translation: 正在将选中的UDM结果转换为SSU结果...

message.source: Choose a filename to save the statistical result
message.translation: 选取一个文件来保存统计学结果

message.source: Save Figures For All SSU Results
Choose a directory to save the figures for all SSU results
message.translation: 选择一个目录来保存所有SSU结果的图片

message.source: Saving the figures for all SSU results...
message.translation: 正在保存所有SSU结果的图片...

message.source: Click to get back to the previous page.
Click to jump to the next page.
The function to calculate the difference between prediction and observation.
message.translation: 该函数被用来计算预测和观测数据之间的差异。

message.source: Are you sure to remove all SSU results?
message.translation: 你确定要删除所有SSU结果吗？

message.source: The variation history was not recorded, can not calculate the loss series.
message.translation: 拟合结果的变化历史没有被记录，无法计算损失变化序列。

message.source: The grain size classes of the SSU results in binary file are inconsistent with that in list.
message.translation: 二进制文件中的SSU结果的粒级与列表中的并不一致。

message.source: The binary file is invalid (i.e., the objects in it are not SSU results).
message.translation: 该二进制文件是无效的（储存的对象不是SSU的结果）。

message.source: Choose a filename to save the SSU Results
message.translation: 选取一个文件来保存SSU的结果

message.source: There are {0} results were evaluated as the outliers. Please check the logs for more details. Do you want to remove them?
message.translation: 有 {0} 个结果被评估为异常值。请检查日志以获取更多信息。你想要删除他们吗？

message.source: The number of results is not enough.
Choose the file which stores the dumped SSU results
message.translation: 选择一个储存了转存的SSU结果的文件

message.source: The function to calculate the difference between prediction and observation.
message.translation: 该函数被用来计算预测和观测数据之间的差异。

message.source: The optimizer to find the minimum of loss function.
message.translation: 被用来寻找损失函数最小值的优化器。
是否尝试全局优化算法。

message.source: Maximum number of iterations of global optimization.
message.translation: 全局优化过程中的最大迭代次数。

message.source: The number of iterations that reaching the same minimum value.
message.translation: 达到同一个最小值的次数。

message.source: The step size of searching the global minimum.
message.translation: 搜索全局最小值的步长。

message.source: Maximum Number of Iterations of Optimizer
message.translation: 优化器的最大迭代次数

message.source: Maximum number of iterations of the optimizer in global and local optimization.
message.translation: 全局和局部优化过程中使用的优化器的最大迭代次数。

message.source: Record the variation history of parameters or not.
message.translation: 是否记录参数变化历史。

message.source: Click to back to the previous page.
Click to jump to the next page.
By clicking the option at menu bar, you can load the grain size distributions (Menu -> Open -> Grain Size Dataset).
message.translation: 通过点击菜单栏中的选项（菜单 -> 打开 -> 粒度数据集），你可以将加载粒度分布。

message.source: By clicking the option at menu bar, you can save the statistical parameters and classification groups to a Excel file (Menu -> Save -> Statistical Result).
message.translation: 通过点击菜单栏中的选项（菜单 -> 保存 -> 统计学结果），你可以将统计学参数和分组结果保存到一个Excel文件中。

message.source: By right clicking at the table region, you can open the menu to draw charts.
message.translation: 通过右击图标区域，你可以打开用来绘制图表的菜单。

message.source: The dataset has not been loaded.
The dataset has not been loaded.
The dataset size exceeded the limitation of remote grpc server.
message.translation: 数据集的大小超出了远程GRPC服务器的限制。

message.source: The UDM fitting task failed, please check the logs for more details.
message.translation: UDM的拟合任务失败了，请检查日志以获取详情。

message.source: Choose the file which stores the dumped UDM result
message.translation: 选则储存了UDM结果的文件

message.source: The binary file is invalid (i.e., the object in it is not the UDM result).
message.translation: 这个二进制文件是无效的（里面的对象不是UDM结果）。

message.source: Choose a filename to save the selected UDM result
message.translation: 选取一个文件来保存选中的UDM结果

message.source: PyTorch can use the NVIDIA GPU to do calculations.
The number of epochs before formal training. The pretrain process only update the proportions of end members.
message.translation: 正式训练之前的训练轮数。预训练过程只更新端元的相对含量。

message.source: Minimum number of epochs to be performed.
Maximum number of epochs to be performed.
It controls the precision of final loss.
message.translation: 它决定了算法最终损失值的精度。

message.source: The learning rate of the neural network to update its weights from gradient.
message.translation: 神经网络从梯度更新权重时的学习率。

message.source: Betas are the coefficients used for computing running averages of gradient and its square.
message.translation: Beta值是用于滑动平均梯度的系数。

message.source: It controls the constraint intensity of the end member diversity between different samples. When the constraint level is high, the end members of different samples tend to be equal.
message.translation: 它决定了对于不同样本中同一端元的差异性的约束强度。当约束等级很高的时候，不同样本中的同一端元趋近于相同。

message.source: Record the variation history of parameters or not.
message.translation: 是否记录参数的变化历史。
